section.name: Building Jadabs
section.p: To build Jadabs you need to install maven first.
We are using an OSGi plugin for maven to build the bundles. Download the maven-osgi-plugin as described.

Checkout Jadabs from the wlab/cvsmaster
> cvs co jadabs
Compile with maven. This downloads many required jars from the internet. Be sure to do this compile step otherwise the dependencies will be missing in eclipse.

section.name: Build distribution
section.p: To build a distribution you need first to checkout the maven repository which contains some more bundles from Knopflerfish into the workspace. This will create a directory like jadabs/jadabs-x.x.x. Packaged files are stored in jadabs/target/distributions.
section.source: > cd workspace > cvs co maven > cd jadabs > maven jadabs:dist
